results.brief_description: When the creator of a popular video game system dies, a virtual contest is created to compete for his fortune.

constellations_other.name: The Wilhelm scream, easters eggs and open world games
constellations_other.description: This Constellation tracks how an on-set in-joke became one of the first cinematic easter eggs. It was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Harrison Buikstra and Jasper Caverly.

results.title: Devilman Crybaby
results.creator_credit: Go Nagai, Eunyoung Choi, Yōhei Shintaku, Dynamic Planning and Science SARU
results.brief_description: Akira Fudo learns from his best friend Ryo Asuka that demons will revive and reclaim the world from humans. With humans hopeless against this threat, Ryo suggests combining with a demon. With this, Akira becomes Devilman, a being with the power of demon but with a human heart.

constellations_primary.name: Evangelical animation
constellations_primary.description: This Constellation exploring animation was created by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies student Melanie Kavanagh.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Go Nagai, Eunyoung Choi, Yōhei Shintaku, Dynamic Planning and Science SARU

results.title: Adventure
results.brief_description: Adventure is a video game for the Atari 2600 video game console, released at Christmas time in 1979. In the game, the player controls a square avatar whose quest is to hunt an open world environment for a magical chalice, returning it to the golden castle.

constellations_other.name: The Wilhelm scream, easters eggs and open world games
constellations_other.description: This Constellation tracks how an on-set in-joke became one of the first cinematic easter eggs. It was made by Swinburne Cinema and Screen Studies students Harrison Buikstra and Jasper Caverly.

results.description: Adventure is a video game for the Atari 2600 video game console, released at Christmas time in 1979. In the game, the player controls a square avatar whose quest is to hunt an open world environment for a magical chalice, returning it to the golden castle. The game world is populated by roaming enemies: dragons, which can eat the avatar; and a bat, which randomly steals and hides items around the game world.
description_for_label: Adventure is a video game for the Atari 2600 video game console, released at Christmas time in 1979. In the game, the player controls a square avatar whose quest is to hunt an open world environment for a magical chalice, returning it to the golden castle. The game world is populated by roaming enemies: dragons, which can eat the avatar; and a bat, which randomly steals and hides items around the game world.

results.title: Loop
results.brief_description: A documentary about Melbourne’s Underground Rail Loop, its effect on the entire metropolitan railway system, and on the future of public transport in Melbourne. Shows the route the loop tracks and tunnels will follow around the city, the sites for the three new underground stations to supplement the present two stations, how passengers will travel from suburban stations when the loop is operating, how the loop is being constructed, and the benefits for train travellers of having five city stations close to shops, theatres and offices. Photographed by Volk Mol, sound by Don Boardman, edited by Geoff Wright, narrated by Michael Pate. Produced for the Melbourne Underground Rail Loop Authority.

Photographed by Volk Mol, sound by Don Boardman, edited by Geoff Wright, narrated by Michael Pate. Produced for the Melbourne Underground Rail Loop Authority.

results.title: Collective
results.creator_credit: Hanka Kastelicová, Alexander Nanau, Antoaneta Opris, Bianca Oana, Bernard Michaux, Magnolia Pictures, Sundance Institute Documentary Fund, Luxembourg Film Fund, Centrul National al Cinematografiei (CNC), MDR, HBO Europe, Alexander Nanau Production and Samsa Film
results.brief_description: In the aftermath of a tragic fire in a Romanian club, burn victims begin dying in hospitals from wounds that were not life threatening. A team of investigative journalists move into action uncovering the mass corruption of the health system and of the state institutions. Collective follows journalists, whistle blowers, and authorities alike. An immersive and uncompromising look into a dysfunctional system, exposing corruption, propaganda, and manipulation that nowadays affect not only Romania, but societies around the world.

constellations_primary.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_primary.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Hanka Kastelicová, Alexander Nanau, Antoaneta Opris, Bianca Oana, Bernard Michaux, Magnolia Pictures, Sundance Institute Documentary Fund, Luxembourg Film Fund, Centrul National al Cinematografiei (CNC), MDR, HBO Europe, Alexander Nanau Production and Samsa Film

Collective follows journalists, whistle blowers, and authorities alike. An immersive and uncompromising look into a dysfunctional system, exposing corruption, propaganda, and manipulation that nowadays affect not only Romania, but societies around the world.

results.title: Workout
results.brief_description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program. The program includes a 30 minute beginners’ class and a 60 minute advanced session. Fond would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.
description_for_label: Jane Fonda’s Workout is the original VHS workout program, inspired by her best-selling book. The program includes a 30-minute beginners’ class and a 60-minute advanced session. Fonda would go on to release 23 different home workout videos and sell more than 17 million copies.

results.title: ABZÛ
results.brief_description: ABZÛ is an exploration game where you are a lone diver in a lush ocean world. The diver descends deeper and deeper into the depths, where she will encounter majestic creatures, discover ancient secrets, and search for her true purpose.

constellations_other.name: Deep blue
constellations_other.description: Go deep on an exploration of real world oceans and those rendered by pixels and creatures made from plastics.

results.title: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
results.brief_description: The epic life story of Alice Guy-Blaché (1873–1968), a French screenwriter, director and producer, true pioneer of cinema, the first person who made a narrative fiction film; author of hundreds of movies, but banished from history books.

constellations_other.name: Film firsts
constellations_other.description: The early days of cinema were an exciting period of experimentation, with many inventors racing to come up with their own moving-image devices.

results.title_for_label: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
results.description: The epic life story of Alice Guy-Blaché (1873–1968), a French screenwriter, director and producer, true pioneer of cinema, the first person who made a narrative fiction film; author of hundreds of movies, but banished from history books. Ignored and forgotten. At last remembered.

results.title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
results.creator_credit: Markus Kirschner, Justin Wilkes, Liz Garbus, Rebecca Luke, Amy Hobby and RadicalMedia
results.brief_description: The film chronicles Nina Simone’s journey from child piano prodigy to iconic musician and passionate activist, told in her own words.

constellations_other.name: Assassins: real world manifestations
constellations_other.description: Ryan White’s documentary Assassins breaks down the wild true story of the assassination of North Korea’s Kim John-nam, diving into the political and personal motivations behind the event.
